name: BOX KAR RACING
description:
BOX KAR RACING is a physics-based racer unlike any other!

WOW!

Featuring prototype designs, janky physics, and terrible level design it is bound to make you say:

This is SO BAD ITS GOOD!

That's because it was made for the So Bad It's Good Jam 2021!

Features:

Terrible Graphics

No Music or Sound whatsoever!

Jank Physics

Bad Level Design

Decent Menus

And much less!

So come on and Download this 100% Jank racing game for FREE!!!
